title: Apaga Apaga Apaga (Ao Vivo)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eu acho que cê tem que mandar aquela mensagem
lines.translation: I think you have to send that message.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Eu acho que cê tem que mandar aquela mensagem' → 'I think you have to send that message.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Mas manda o que tá no seu coração
lines.translation: But send what's in your heart.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Mas manda o que tá no seu coração' → 'But send what's in your heart.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Porque se fosse eu
lines.translation: Because if it were me
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Porque se fosse eu' → 'Because if it were me'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Eu falaria mais ou menos assim
lines.translation: I would say something like this
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Eu falaria mais ou menos assim' → 'I would say something like this'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Ei, boa noite, antes de te bloquear
lines.translation: Hey, good evening, before I block you.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Ei, boa noite, antes de te bloquear' → 'Hey, good evening, before I block you.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Eu só vim te dizer que a partir de hoje
lines.translation: I just came to tell you that starting today
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Eu só vim te dizer que a partir de hoje' → 'I just came to tell you that starting today'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Pode tocar o terror, fazer o que quiser fazer
lines.translation: You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Pode tocar o terror, fazer o que quiser fazer' → 'You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: A boca é sua, curte suas farra, sinto mais nada
lines.translation: It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'A boca é sua, curte suas farra, sinto mais nada' → 'It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Não! Apaga, apaga, apaga
lines.translation: No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Não! Apaga, apaga, apaga' → 'No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Oi, boa noite!
lines.translation: Hey goodnight!
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Oi, boa noite!' → 'Hey goodnight!'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Só vim pedir um tempo
lines.translation: I just came to ask for some time.

lines.text: Pra dar tempo de esquecer
lines.translation: To give time to forget.
